title: Drawing, "Five Figures from Parnassus by Raphael Sanzio", ca. 1820
title_raw: Five Figures from Parnassus by Raphael Sanzio
medium: Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over black chalk on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Seated boy, head and part of right leg shown. Drawn twofold. Two poets at right of Homer and half-figure shown  next to standing Muses, which are at left of Apollo.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Five Figures from Parnassus by Raphael Sanzio", ca. 1820. Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over black chalk on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1932.
